The image appears to show a real creatio: an artist known as Livin' Plastic on social media.
The Barbie: themed Ouija board is not an official product from Mattel, the company that owns Barbie's brand. The Ouija trademark is owned by Hasbro, a rival company.
The combination of Barbie: one of the world's most popular dolls, with the Ouija board game, known for calling spirits back from the dead, intrigued Reddit users.
The image of the Barbie: themed Ouija board was found to be associated with Servando Hernandez, who confirmed that it belongs to a series of objects created by him and is not an official product.
